title: DIamond 4 ADC main Looking for serious team!

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hi guys!
I'm currently looking for a serious team in need for a ADC
I currently have my main account (wyndhem) in diamond 4 and a smurf account (argnean) in plat 4
I have played the game since season 3 and have climbed to diamond and looking to take the next step
and joining a team!
my main carrys are:
Graves
Lucian
Sivir
quinn
and ezreal
Im 21 and mature, i have a lot of confidence in a team inviroment and am really our going!
So if you guys are serious and want to have a chat add me in game : Wyndhem or Argnean
Also email me on
Melooney@hotmail.com!

Thanks guys!

replies.body: Ok, well if you're happy to play in a mixed rank team. You're more than welcome to join mine. Also I have an all diamond/veteran player team you might like to join.
